steps.title: A morning message can be a sign of interest, depending on the context.
steps.content: A morning message can be a sign of interest, depending on the context. If the other person consistently texts you, uses flirty emojis , and gives you compliments, itâ€™s probably a sign that theyâ€™re interested. With that being said, you should pay attention to their behavior outside of texting to make sure itâ€™s not platonic. Other signs that someone likes you include: prolonged eye contact, open body language, mirroring your body language, touching you, and playfully teasing you. [2] X Research source
